targetLine.text: P. Sherman 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. Why do I have to tell you over and over again? I’ll tell you again. I don’t get tired of it...

contextBefore.text: Excuse me... Hi. Do you know how to get to hello? Wait! Can you tell me... Hey! Hold it! Wait a minute! I’m trying to talk to you! OK, fellas, come back here. Please, one quick question. I need to and they’re gone again. [sighing]

contextAfter.text: OK, all right. Here’s the thing. You know, I just, think it’s best if I just, if I just, carry on from here by myself.
You know, alone. Without, well, I mean, not without you. I mean, it’s just that I don’t want you, with me.
